= Freud test examples =

Below are static classes that create example analysis tests [http://code.google.com/p/freud/source/browse/trunk/src/main/org/langera/freud/Analysis.java Analysis] object instances.

Each *Analysis* object is constructed by passing it an [http://code.google.com/p/freud/source/browse/trunk/src/main/org/langera/freud/util/collection/AnalysedObjectIterator.java AnalysedObjectIterator] - The entities to be analysed.

The actual test is performed by calling the Analysis interface's only method:

`void analyse(AnalysisListener listener);`

All examples are tested using various analysed objects in tests under same package.
